headline: A Look at Lennox International's Valuation After Lowered 2025 Outlook and Third-Quarter Revenue Decline
summary: Lennox International (NYSE:LII) is drawing investor attention after management reported third-quarter revenue fell year-over-year and revised its full-year 2025 outlook lower in response to continued weakness across key HVAC markets. See our latest analysis for Lennox International. Lennox International’s share price has seen a rough patch recently, down over 19% year-to-date and nearly 20% lower over the last three months. Markets have reacted quickly to softer revenues, downbeat 2025...
